text: Palatine Hill (Latin: Palatium) also named the Sun Hill was the hill that Rome was built on. Rome later extended to include the seven hills: *Palatine *Aventine *Capitoline *Quirinal *Viminal *Esquiline *Caelian == Etymology == According to Livy (59 BC â€“ 17) the Palatine hill got its name from the Arcadian settlement of Pallantium. The term palace itself stems from Palatium. Category:Rome Category:Hills of Europe
title: Palatine Hill
